clean_data: Sr Consultant Sr Consultant Fremont CA An Oracle Certified database administrator data warehouse specialist with more than twenty years information technology experience I usually conducted both database administration and database development work for many companies at the same time Good at resolving different kinds of database issues including database performance tuning in production environments as well as in development environment I also had conducted many lifecycle database development on database design and its implementation In many occasions I found myself being
